original_title: A historia dun satélite (Rafael e a nai que o pariu)
overview: Rafael lives an event that will mark him forever: his father dies crushed by a satellite. Twenty years later, Rafael works as a burial ground, and starts a rocambolesque vital journey in which he ends up realizing that his whole life has been orbiting in a busy direction.
title: A historia dun satélite (Rafael e a nai que o pariu)
